entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -29.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -33.2°C
Wind: WSW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
